cause.description:
Catholic Charities provides immigration legal assistance, refugee resettlement social services; case management services to families; residential programs for pregnant teenagers; individual, family, marital and school counseling; transitional housing for those who are homeless or at risk of homelessness; social action programs (advocacy); meal programs for people living with HIV/AIDS; parish nursing; and parish education services. Catholic Charities has provided services to the poor and disenfranchised of this community since 1912.
1. The underprivileged have rights to a home, legal assistance, health care and education
cause.mission: Put into practice the Gospel values of justice, love, compassion and hope through service, empowerment and advocacy to help the people of all faiths.
cause.name: Catholic Charities
